price: 68. Ee Rabbiyow sii cadaab labanlaab ah, nacladna naclad weyn.
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ وَٱلۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡنٗا كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ātihim ḍiʿ'fayni mina al-ʿadhābi wal-ʿanhum laʿnan kabīran
